problem_type: Student drags a single fraction label or places a point at the correct position beyond 1 on a pre-partitioned number line (fourths only)
workspace_description: Number line from 0 to 2, pre-partitioned into fourths with tick marks at 0, 1/4, 2/4, 3/4, 1, 5/4, 6/4, 7/4, 2. Labels at 0, 1, and 2 only. Drag palette with fraction label '5/4'.
action_description: Label tick marks by dragging fraction label
prompt: Place five-fourths on the number line.
